person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .

Let's think step by step.

1. Security Council: It is a collective body of 15 members in the United Nations (UN) responsible for maintaining international peace and security.
2. The new secretary-general: This refers to the individual who will replace Boutros-Ghali as the head of the UN Secretariat.
3. The 185-members General Assembly: This is the main deliberative, policy-making and representative organ of the UN, with 193 Member States.

So, the identified "Person" entities in the paragraph are:
1. Security Council (collective body)
2. The new secretary-general (individual)
3. Boutros-Ghali (individual)
4. The 185-members General Assembly (collective body)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .

Let's think step by step.

1. Security Council: This is a specific location and a well-known body of the United Nations, which is responsible for maintaining international peace and security.
2. General Assembly: This is another specific location and a main deliberative, policymaking and representative organ of the United Nations, with 185 member states as of the time mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. Security Council
2. General Assembly (UN)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to locations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The Security Council has to vote on a new secretary-general and then seek the endorsement of the 185-members General Assembly before December 31 when Boutros-Ghali 's term expires .

Let's think step by step.

1. Security Council: It is a permanent body of the United Nations (UN) charged with maintaining international peace and security. It is an intergovernmental organization.
2. General Assembly: It is one of the six main organs of the United Nations. All member states of the UN are represented in the General Assembly, making it the most representative body of the UN. It is an intergovernmental organization.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Security Council: It is a permanent body of the United Nations (UN) charged with maintaining international peace and security.
2. United Nations (UN): It is an intergovernmental organization founded in 1945.
3. General Assembly: It is one of the six main organs of the United Nations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Security Council (a permanent body of the United Nations (UN)) |
| United Nations (UN) |
| General Assembly (one of the six main organs of the United Nations) |
